2.speaker: B
sentence: I know a gas station on the way.
나 알아 가스 스테이션을 가는 길에

3.speaker: A
sentence: While we're at it, I should get my car washed.

sentence: You have to make a left at the next light.

sentence: I need to fill up the tank. We have a long way to go.

6.speaker: B
sentence: Fill her up, please. Can i get a car wash?
